statements: DELETE FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE site_name = 'Site A';
DELETE FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE id = 1 AND site_name = 'Site A';
DELETE FROM network_configuration_data_5g WHERE frequency_band = '5G' AND bandwidth >= 100 AND tower_height > 50.0;
DELETE FROM deployment_plan WHERE site_id = 100 AND planned_start_date = '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM network_configuration WHERE network_name = 'Home Network';
DELETE FROM network_cells WHERE cell_type = '5G' AND max_antennas = 4;
